name: Nettie Konigsberg
summary: Nettie Konigsberg. Self: Wild Man Blues. Nettie Konigsberg was born on 8 November 1906 in New York City, New York, USA. She was previously married to Martin Konigsberg. She died on 27 January 2002 in New York City, New York, USA.

castMovies.title: American Masters
castMovies.description: (TV Series documentary) Self - Mother of Woody Allen - Woody Allen: A Documentary (2011) ... Self - Mother of Woody Allen
